text: Ash Wednesday is a 1973 American mystery drama movie directed by Larry Peerce and starring Elizabeth Taylor, Henry Fonda, Helmut Berger, Keith Baxter. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 drama movies Category:1973 mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Larry Peerce
title: Ash Wednesday (1973 movie)
